display_long_description:
# Just updated! Read about the exciting new features in the post below!

# Turn Your Home Into a Battlefield in Spatial Ops – The Ultimate Mixed Reality Multiplayer Experience!
Step into fast-paced, competitive and cooperative battles with friends in Spatial Ops. Compete in co-located matches with up to 8 players in real-world environments, transforming your space into an action-packed arena. 
[media]
**Prefer going solo?** Progress through the campaign as you fight to save the world from interdimensional threats.

# Key Features:
- **Multiplayer Combat Chaos** – Battle up to 7 friends in mixed reality environments with fast-paced, competitive and team-based modes.
- **Co-Located Play** – Map out your real-world space and play laser-tag-like battles in your home or any location. Share your map with others.
- **Diverse Game Modes** – Engage in Free-for-All, Team Deathmatch, Co-op Survival, Capture the Flag, and Domination.
- **Story-Driven Campaign** – Experience the excitement of portals opening up in your own home as you fend off enemies and uncover the dark secrets behind their invasion.
- **Weapons and Upgrades** – Unlock new weapons and customize your character’s loadout.
- **Mixed Reality Integration** – Interact with your real-world environment as the game blends virtual enemies, portals, and battlegrounds into your space.
- **bHaptics Support** – Feel the impact of incoming fire, weapon and item use, and explosive encounters as they happen. 
[media]

# The world is under threat, and we need elite agents like you!
[media]
